name: ANNOYING ball game
description:
In the ANNOYING ball game you play as a ball. You will be going through a lengthy obstacle course trying to reach the end. There are 3 endings all varying in gameplay, settings and obstacles. All 3 endings are also varying in length so lots of fun time can be spent in this game!
Wait... I think I meant ANNOYING time can be spent here. This game will annoy almost anyone! So hop on in and try your best in not being ANNOYED!
